Name: Mood Indigo
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of violet blossom or mint sprig.
Review: Smooth, delicate and floral: the gin and brandy add just enough bite.
History: Named after the jazz standard that was a hit for Nat King Cole.
Nutrition: One serving of Mood Indigo contains 198 calories
